alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Harlan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 9:13PM CDT until June 07 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Southeastern Furnas County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beaver City, or 19 miles north of Norton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Long Island, Woodruff and Prairie View. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
